title: Library
content: Since we haven't got the id card yet, so can we use the books given in library?

comments.body: I asked them today.....they told us to come by Thursday since they have not completed our  registration in their system.
If you're in EC campus, you can use the library but you can't borrow any books. There's a book where you can write your srn and enter if you don't have an id card. Not sure abt RR campus
I did ask some people and they said you can get them to read and can't borrow. Also, which library has good books for freshers?

RR campus library, and it's not even close. The EC campus library barely counts as a library, it's just a few books with a lot of copies of the same books. The library in GJ block has like 4 floors or something and it's like 100 times better. Everything is better in RR lol
In RR you can use the library but you have to sign in on one registration book they have
